description: Time period to exclude when calculating anesthesia concurrency. The full time range (without exclusion) can be found in the PRE_AR_ANES_TIMES table. Note: temporary accounts receivable (TAR) records in Chronicles are purged periodically depending on your system setting. Be aware that old data in this table might be lost if you truncate the table.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the subject record.

columns.name: CHARGE_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANES_EXCL_START_TM
columns.description: The starting time of the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency calculation.

columns.name: ANES_EXCL_START_DT
columns.description: The starting date of the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency  calculation.

columns.name: ANES_EXCL_END_TM
columns.description: The ending time of the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency  calculation.

columns.name: ANES_EXCL_END_DT
columns.description: The ending date of the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency  calculation.

columns.name: ANES_EXCL_CMT
columns.description: The comment of the period exclusion in anesthesia concurrency calculation.
